Minimal given start_time gaps between Half and 10K. If convergence: Fast 10K / Slow Half (pace) or Half with high start_offset.
Minimal given start_time gaps between Half and Full. If convergence: Fast Half and Slow Full (pace) or Full with high start_offset.
Minimal given start_time gaps between Full and 10K. If convergence: Slow 10K or 10K high start_offset and Face Full (pace) from Full Turn (Blake)
Minimal given start_time gaps between Full and 10K. If convergence: Fast 10K and Slow Full (pace) or Full with high start_offset.
Minimal given start_time gaps between Full and Half. If convergence: Fast Full and Slow Half (pace) or Half with high start_offset.
Minimal given start_time gaps between Full and 10K. If convergence: Fast Full and Slow 10K (pace) or 10K with high start_offset.
High: this is a Merge point of all events despite start_time gaps and distances covered. If high pct run Flow Runner Audit analysis.
